column3: “Oh Pineapple Trainwreck, what have you done to me? I'm an experienced smoker with severe arthritis, and this strain knocked me into an ocean and left me stranded there without a life vest. The onset takes a little bit for sure. You start to feel very giggly and happy, and then you get smacked in the face with a tsunami of highness. My body was floating in nothingness, and all my pain disappeared completely. You do ge...”

“Back at it again! Copped some of this from a local dispensary and smoked it in a hemp wrap they provided for free ninety-nine. Taste was...eh! But the high was top shelf. It's nice when you smoke with a group of people and everyone has this realization that we just smoked good bud. Concerning the effects, It's a nice cerebral buzz, but I felt mellow and clearheaded. Not gonna get a surge of energy from this stuff but...”

“I really like this, I'm a diabetic with severe neuropathy and muscle pain spasms.  While vape'ing with this all pain was gone, very up-lifting and positive happy.  However also very talkative LOL.  Great weed!”

“Oddly enough I Love Love Trainwreck. Which is odd because I do not really care for Pineapple Express.  Trainwreck is a great medication for migraines and stress or anxiety. Great body buzz, great head buzz as it shuts everything off. Allowing your body to pump more blood to the brain therefore freeing you from headaches or migraines. Works best when only smoked for a few weeks then rotating with two or three others.”

“Location: L'Eagle Services 
THC: 18.32%
CBD: 0.00%

Appearance Rating: 5.00
Appearance Description: These pale green flowers are so crystal covered it is insane! They are mostly fat chunky nugs with pinkish red hairs.  They are extremely beautiful and are well manicured. 

Taste Rating: 4.00
Taste Description:  The taste on this strain is rather unique. The trainwreck flavors definitely shine through, but with a dist...”

“Decided to smoke pineapple trainwreck after a few month break and was pretty nervous due to the anxiety I get when I smoke.  This strain eased my senses immediately and I felt like for once, everything in my mind felt okay and that I was genuinely safe.  This strain is great for being social.  I felt like I wanted to talk on and on, and also gave me a boost of creativity for guitar playing and songwriting.  Definitel...”

“My house in infested with ants. So when I took a seat on my couch having just taken two fat hoots of Pineapple Trainwreck, I noticed two warrior ants locked in a duel to the death against the vast white backdrop that is my carpet. My first inclination was to grab a few squares of toilet paper, crush them both within, and flush their broken insect bodies down the crapper. But as this impulse moved through me another f...”

“When I opened the jar I was hit with the refreshing slightly fruity/slightly pine aroma. The taste was fairly mellow, but a bit harsh using an ice bong. My bud was kind of dry, though. My head had been hurting pretty bad, but I had some things I wanted to get done, so I went with a sativa hybrid. I was a bit dizzy for the first 15 minutes or so, and my pain went from about an 8 to a 5. It wasn't the best strain I've ...”

“This is my favorite day time strain. Hits hard, so don't expect to go anywhere for a few minutes. After that, a very mellow and super energetic buzz comes on and lasts for a while. A little bit goes a long way.”

“First timer I shared with heavily enjoyed, reeeeeeeeally wants pizza, Ate all my oreo ice cream and donuts. Says it made him/her enjoy jim jeffries a lot more. 

Mixed with Afghan Trainwreck in a blunt.”

“Great earthy smelling/tasting strain with subtle fruity quality about it. Very relaxing for the body and relaxing for the mind as well. Perfect balance of stoned and clear headedness. Great for anxiety and pain.”

“Migraine pain mild; nausea 7; anxiety 9 when I medicated round 1100 or so? Takes bout 5-10 min to start working. Pain/nausea gone. I can't say no anxiety as my disorder has been outta control. But I did manage to not go off the deep end which was wonderful! Body high allowed me to eat breakfast. Hard to concentrate to do much but that's as much just me as it is the side effects of dis strain. Head high helped me esca...”

“This strain is definetly more of a sativa, but it gave drymouth out the wazoo. nit gave a small headache, but thats after the ride. it tastes excellent but it was a litle harsh. all in all a good strain.”

“Great odor, crush a bud and you want to do it again.  The first few hits in my vaporgenie are like diving into pot ambrosia, a hint of trainwreck spice and something else I can't put a finger on. It just rolls over my tongue.
Tasty the way Jack Herer is tasty, but a little lighter. Yummy and sensual. 

One of my favorite wake and bakes ever, more fun than Blue Dream and just as focused. Two hours of up.
Makes me ...”

“This Bud is an overall experience from start to finish your relaxed , talkative and happy. At first the feeling is a little strange not a usual stativa dominant almost overwhelmed feeling, but rather laid back and europhic”

“Method of consumption: Volcano Vaporizer

Pros: Both mind and body high that starts in the head and spreads to the body. Very relaxing and decreases/eliminates pain while increases mood. Smell and vape were wonderful, very smooth on draw and exhale. Can make you giggly & talkative.

Cons: If you don't like pineapple, you may not like the flavor. While effects were long lasting, I did notice some discomfort from pain ...”

“Great odor, crush a bud and you want to do it again.  The first few hits in my vaporgenie are like diving into pot ambrosia, a hint of trainwreck spice and something else I can't put a finger on. It just rolls over my tongue.
Tasty the way Jack Herer is tasty, but a little lighter. Yummy and sensual. 

One of my favorite wake and bakes ever, more fun than Blue Dream and just as focused. Two hours of up.
Makes me ...”
“Just ok.  I was ready for a new strain after a few days.  I wouldn't recommend this strain for someone with chronic issues.  It works ok for nausea but I built up a tolerance to it very quickly.”

“This Bud is an overall experience from start to finish your relaxed , talkative and happy. At first the feeling is a little strange not a usual stativa dominant almost overwhelmed feeling, but rather laid back and europhic”

“Nice flavor, very clean MJ taste (a little wood taste, no pine/flower flavor). The effects are pretty uplifting, a good wake and bake bud. Maybe a little too thought provoking for those prone to anxiety. Overall I like this strain, but a buddy of mine talked it up a lot and I don't think it's anything special.”

“Finally decided to write this review NOT after having PTW (not cool, just easier👈🏻). After just a few hits or a bowl, I’m going! With a VERY high tolerance!
This makes me energeric, creative, horny, hungry, happy, takes away anxiety & lasts a long ass time! 
I overlooked this gem for years, trying the newer stuff. Pineapple Trainwreck is 1 of the best smokes I’vevsmoked! 
Not bad for a free gram!”

“Love this strain, I haven't had many good sativas I guess cause none of them were near as good as this one. Great for daytime smoking and as always music is incredible. Very potent stuff I can feel the effects almost instantly, perfect for being social and havin a good smoke with other people =)”

“Very much liked this flavor... although this seems to be a reoccurring comment by me. Excellent daytime smoke that comes on real hard, leaves you trainwrecked for about a half hour and then mellows out into a very nice wakey wakey high. Picked this up from the Emerald Palace in Gilbert, AZ Nice dispensary and great product!”
“True pineapple train wreck is rare there's a lot of imposters out there or not grown correctly auburn WA p.s to hell with my the N.W.O!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!”
“This one was really mellow, bordering on couchlock.  Happy, relaxed an dry eyes for me.”

“First time I ever smoked I smoked pineapple train wreck, it works great for my anxiety and depression, it's very uplifting and euphoric, it is a little harsh and sometimes leaves me coughing like crazy, it also helps with pain. This strain is great when you want to feel uplifted, happy and
 energetic. 5/5”

“Smoked two blunts of this strain. I always wanted to try each of these strains so when I found out my local dispensary had this strain in stock I was excited very good high smells great !!!! Starts of pretty energetic then slowly mellows out”
“True pineapple train wreck is rare there's a lot of imposters out there or not grown correctly auburn WA p.s to hell with my the N.W.O!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!”

“This was amazing for the  bursitis in my knee. 
Once a day and night is all I needed for 24hrs of pain relief and 100% swelling reduction. 
This replaced me having to get a cortisone shot into my knee, I went for the appointment and they said that I don’t need the shot anymore because they can’t find anything wrong with my knee anymore.”
“great stuff....”

“Love this strain, I haven't had many good sativas I guess cause none of them were near as good as this one. Great for daytime smoking and as always music is incredible. Very potent stuff I can feel the effects almost instantly, perfect for being social and havin a good smoke with other people =)”
“one of my new favorites.”
“one of my new favorites.”

“Very much liked this flavor... although this seems to be a reoccurring comment by me. Excellent daytime smoke that comes on real hard, leaves you trainwrecked for about a half hour and then mellows out into a very nice wakey wakey high. Picked this up from the Emerald Palace in Gilbert, AZ Nice dispensary and great product!”

“love this strain, the smell is amazing on the nose..It's a fast hitter with mellow vibes. I would recommend this hybird to anyone wanting a great day time smke, where you can still get things accomplish, this strain can be a candidate. Its also mellow for night time smoking as well..”
“True pineapple train wreck is rare there's a lot of imposters out there or not grown correctly auburn WA p.s to hell with my the N.W.O!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!”

“Love this strain, I haven't had many good sativas I guess cause none of them were near as good as this one. Great for daytime smoking and as always music is incredible. Very potent stuff I can feel the effects almost instantly, perfect for being social and havin a good smoke with other people =)”
“Great creative high, sure to lift your spirits. More focused than a Trainwreck high.”
“This one was really mellow, bordering on couchlock.  Happy, relaxed an dry eyes for me.”

“With the raw power of trainwreck and the creativity of pineapple express, the aptly named Pineapple Trainwreck is an awesome find. This bud creates a powerful and creative head high that only a fine sativa can do. It is one of the best strains I have smoked and would recommend it not only for the potency but the flavor as well.”
“one of my new favorites.”

“Love this strain, I haven't had many good sativas I guess cause none of them were near as good as this one. Great for daytime smoking and as always music is incredible. Very potent stuff I can feel the effects almost instantly, perfect for being social and havin a good smoke with other people =)”
“some of the best I've ever encountered.”
“phenomenal - great for migraines and a very uplifting feeling.”
“Tastes very good and smells wonderful, found it harder to light but when i got it going, i flew through sky i was so high an amazing buzz but the trouble i had lighting it annoyed me”
“Great plant, smoked decently . Not a lot of coughing while smoking I recommend this plant when you want a mellow mood not too much energy not too much energy taken away”
“very piney but has a good taste and an even better high”

“I fell in love instantly, the smell of the flower alone was piny, yet fruity, which I love. Smoked it in a jay to really taste the flower, perfect combination of tasty and piny, it is a sativa-dominant hybrid, but had a perfect balance. I felt extremely happy and uplifted, but it also hit me harder than i anticipated, I didn’t mind though. My body felt as if it was floating but my mind refreshed. When I came down, I ...”
“very piney but has a good taste and an even better high”
“great med. liked the smell and taste. Helped my nausea”

“I fell in love instantly, the smell of the flower alone was piny, yet fruity, which I love. Smoked it in a jay to really taste the flower, perfect combination of tasty and piny, it is a sativa-dominant hybrid, but had a perfect balance. I felt extremely happy and uplifted, but it also hit me harder than i anticipated, I didn’t mind though. My body felt as if it was floating but my mind refreshed. When I came down, I ...”
“really good strain hate the smell and taste but worth it for the high !”
“Very great smell. Both sweet and pungent. Loved it. Good chill high. Very dense”
“One of my favorites.  Hits hard, lasts 3-4 hours.  A great chill-out, do nothing but eat and relax.  Pain disappears.  Can be hard to find, but worth it.  :)”

“blast off 🚀 great for day time use. careful if tend to have a lil anxiety when it comes to the sativa dominant strains though. this one will get ya goin. overall great flavor and smooth smoke. enjoy ✌”
“feels more like an in indica than a sativa, IMO.”
“Very great smell. Both sweet and pungent. Loved it. Good chill high. Very dense”

“Clean , uplifting, floating . Yum yum tasty .
Grows like a damn weed.”

“blast off 🚀 great for day time use. careful if tend to have a lil anxiety when it comes to the sativa dominant strains though. this one will get ya goin. overall great flavor and smooth smoke. enjoy ✌”
“feels more like an in indica than a sativa, IMO.”

“This flower treats me pretty well. Its smell is very appealing, with a candy/citrus aroma that I cant help but keep smelling time and time again. Theres a slight pineapple taste present in the smoke of this flower which is otherwise smooth and slightly spicy. The high is a bit milder than other strains, and I most definitely feel the sativa effects. Im in less of a focused sativa mood and more of an explorative mood-...”

“I woke up stiff with arthritis. Everything hurt. I took some of this and am now wondering what the problem was.  BOTH pain and stiffness is gone. I'm in place where colours are brighter. I can hear every note in whatever music I'm listening to. If I had to wake and bake, I think this is the strain I'll choose everytime.”
“Tastes great, earthy but crispy, almost citricy. Mellow high, lasted about an hr which is unusually long for me, so a must buy for me”
“The flavor was great, but really made me anxious. Just take a little extra precautions when trying this strain if you suffer from any type of anxiety.”
“not bad, but gets me pretty dried out. gotta chew lotsa double bubble to make up for that stuff”
“Great taste and hits you like a freight train! In my top 5 for sure.”

“very good strain to get a great energetic high from. this one kicks in quick and gives u energy, creativity,  beyond happy n talkative while maintaing a good pain relief for my low bac muscle spasums.”
“Eh, I've had better. A little weak for my liking. It does however wake you up and make you feel ready for your day. Great aroma, before and after. Extremely sweet smell.”

“I managed to find this gem of a strain at a dispo not too far from my place just the other day. I read about it once before and thought “damn this stuff sounds intense, too bad I’ll probably never find any” and to my surprise I found it. Just a few hits from my buddy’s chillum and I was just absolutely fried beyond fried and the smells are like an orgasm to your nose. Great strain, 10/10 would combust again”
“Delicious aromatic fruity flavor.  Super bright and clear onset.  Morphs into a delightful relaxing body stone.  Really clear headed throughout.”

“I smoked this strain for the first time through a bong. Man, I haven't hit something this heavy in a while. It was VERY harsh on my lungs and hard to finish the first bowl, which was pretty packed. The high hits right away and hard at that, I was just out there for a little bit but once it settles in it's great for conversation although your mind does tend to wander. It lasts very long as well and the good thing is t...”

“Pineapple Trainwreck is awesome it relived me from my pain instantly I mean instantly... I feel great 100% better ... I did the research on the strain found it in Denver and the rest is ALL smiles....WOW”
“so sweet and gave me energy! 💚”
“Hard hitting bud. Everything is clear and very uplifting high. which is weird. Didn't expect this from the bud. had a really sweet smell when i broke it down.”

“Pineapple Trainwreck is awesome it relived me from my pain instantly I mean instantly... I feel great 100% better ... I did the research on the strain found it in Denver and the rest is ALL smiles....WOW”
“Great for pain relief”
“I smoked this alone and then mixed it with Lemon Drop too and it knocked me on my ass, even by itself. One of my new favs”
“creative and relaxed but i did get stuck in my head.not bad but i was hoping to feel a bit less couch lock:p. Ps not a beginners strain.”
“Fruity goodness like fruity pebbles and haze.”

“A friend of mine grew this strain (In Oregon, legal to grow.) and the turn out was wonderful! 💖
Light, fluffy, very sticky (I did have trouble breaking apart because it was so sticky. 😉), and dense buds for the TEXTURE.
The COLOR a bright green, sparkly from trichromes, and brightly colored hairs.
The SMELL was delicious, unlike anything I have smelled before. (Can't put words to it. 😣)
I SMOKED this strain and th...”
“such a citrus,pineapple pungent taste with a lovely green exhale,would recommend for daily users.”

“Just grabbed a oz of this new years eve. At first i was a little disappointed in the appearance. It looked liked philly rooftop outdoor. Bright green, with pink hairs, the color was fine, and it was clearly healthy atleast. Then he opened the jar and it smell like 9 months after a pineapple forced himself onto a lemonhead. The taste was the same,pineapple lemon candy filled your nostrils with every green hit, and eve...”
“This is a great strain for a lazy sunday.”

“I love bofa these strains so naturally I was pretty excited. Super beautiful bud. Nice vibrant green yellowish color. Pretty soft when ground. Made me first get a nice mellow cerebral buzz that lasted for around 45 min. It then melted into a soft body buzz that made all my soreness go away. I could've talked for hours too. Makes talking so phun. Makes me a bit groggy on the come down but it's worth it. I wish the bod...”
“I love this.... it gives me energy and feel great”
“He sees rows upon rows of elk antlers, interlaced across the ceiling. And he's not even a hunter. Tallyho! (signed, his secretary, as he is VERY indisposed at the moment).”

“Very nice high, keeps you flying for bout 2 hours after 3 rips. Highly recommend this strain. 
Not real airy but not to dense buds great aroma of pine
And citrus.”
“Got a couple grams of this. Good quality, has a really good taste if youre into that sort of thing and reminds me of pineapple express with taste and effects. Good as a day or night med.”
“Very very strong sativa. Everytime I smoked it I would be in a euphoric state of mind.”
“a top fave”
“I'm fucking blazed.”
“gets the job done... if you can look past the taste, taste very spicy.. to me this is the only downside.”
“love this when pineapple is the major flavor. .and that's what I GOT. ..have fun”
“I love this strain it's my new favorite I love how it makes me feel ...”

“hoping it was just a bad batch but this was my first and not pleasant experience. 

didn't really light very well of stay lit and definitely didn't milk well. Probably won't use it again.”
“Great for keeping my migraines at bay during the day. Keeps a smile of my face😉”
“I like this strain alot good for headaches .the Buds are very nice and bright green.This strain is good for Daytime use if you things to accomplish this is for you.”
“Great for earlier in the day and if you still want to get things done, but still relax.”
“Hits you quick, medium duration, nothing too special.”

“Okay here we go again got this from the same growers but this time pulled all the flavor from the pineapple parent. .very mellow relaxing ...really hitting my arthritis pain nice been in pain lately. ..so big praise for the pain relief! !!oh the high ain't bad either :)”
“Omg! I smoked this for the first time, and it was fucking awesome. I was so high and tingly. Even my eye balls. It was cool. I can't wait to smoke it again.”
“It was nice. I am 50 with fibromyalgia, and I feel amazing! I might actually sleep tonight!”

“Best of all worlds with this fantastic well-balanced hybrid!  
Tastes amazing and fruity and smokes smooth.
Social and relaxing without major sedation.  
Great for group interaction - everybody likes it!  
by:  Organaboys / The Reef”

“Not the most amazing looking buds, but as soon as they were ground up and loaded..blast off 🚀 great, high energy buzz with not too bad of a come down. just load another one and you'll be good brother ✌”
“Relaxed for a couple hours but stayed awake. Great spicy taste!”
“really good strain. looks wonderful and gives a chilled out and long-lasting high. would definitely purchase again. also smells fantastic.”

“This strain is a great sativa dominant hybrid that actually gives you more of a indica relaxed kind of high. Put me in a great laughy mood and great to smoke with friends. Nice to have a good deep conversation”
“Absolutley LOVE IT! Very dense tight buds!”
“My favorite! Love this strain”
“Very good for pain and relaxation!”
“Very aroused, extremely high after one bowl”
“good stuff”
“nice crisp strain”
“Great bud, smoked at 8pm, its about 12, great high, steady crash into a calm feeling, makes ya feel extra sleepy when the high comes down.”
“Great taste and smells amazing! I'll definantly be getting more”
“loved the high from this one”

“very tasty, well groomed and moist. head high lasted about an hour and the pain was gone for about 4-5. very nice...if you don't have anything to do that first hour. :)
side effects: heavy munchies, not a real get up and go kind of med, and pardon my bluntness...had a VERY strong horny factor!”

“Pretty relaxing high, great for a morning session without being a zombie. The bud has a very earthy smell to it. Definitely a nice strand if you still want to be productive, which is why this is my go to for morning sessions. It's a clear high and you can still focus/stay on task without much of a problem. While I prefer indicuds in the evening to help sleep/relax, I could see this doing the trick if needed consideri...”

“best for  my back spasms, headaches and even cramps. i have endometriosis so that is huge for me.

doesn't make me anxious or paranoid. i can still function after smoking PT.”
“Also me.  I'm growing some now”
“My favorite Hybrid! It smells beautiful when grinding it down and definitely has you couch locked in 5 minutes. Love it!”

“SUPER STONEY.  Full body high.  Great for bed time.  Its NOT sativa Dominant.  You wont be able to get much done with this herb.  the flavor is smooth and kinda fruity.   rolls up great in joints.  burns even and not super hot.  its my go to bud for insomnia.”

“I woke up stiff with arthritis. Everything hurt. I took some of this and am now wondering what the problem was.  BOTH pain and stiffness is gone. I'm in place where colours are brighter. I can hear every note in whatever music I'm listening to. If I had to wake and bake, I think this is the strain I'll choose everytime.”

“Tried this one while out on a business trip a few months ago. Got a pre-rolled joint from a local dispensary in SoCal. First the smell. This one is mildly pungent and has a sweet and a bit of an earthy scent. The taste is about the same; sweet yet earthy and somewhat harsh upon exhale. The high is pretty euphoric and cerebral with a strong head high, followed by a nice and relaxed body high. Definitely a sativa-domin...”

“It’s such a great combination two strains I love together. The buds are dense with a slight maybe sweeter smell to it. The high is very heady. I would also just kinda sit and forget what I was gonna do. if you wanna act like a zombie I recommend this herb.”
“Delicious aromatic fruity flavor.  Super bright and clear onset.  Morphs into a delightful relaxing body stone.  Really clear headed throughout.”

“This flower treats me pretty well. Its smell is very appealing, with a candy/citrus aroma that I cant help but keep smelling time and time again. Theres a slight pineapple taste present in the smoke of this flower which is otherwise smooth and slightly spicy. The high is a bit milder than other strains, and I most definitely feel the sativa effects. Im in less of a focused sativa mood and more of an explorative mood-...”

“The Pineapple Trainwreck title has been around for a long time. I am not a fan of the description on how it was formed. I have seen this around for over a decade. Before the movie Pineapple Express ever existed. This was an extremely well known strain around where I grew up, years before the actual Pineapple Express even existed to create the strain this website specifies. It is by far my go to daytime strain. A stro...”
“Easy and mellow high, definitely for daytime use. Doesn’t give you terrible munchies. Good for chronic pain.”
“Great for pain relief”

“I managed to find this gem of a strain at a dispo not too far from my place just the other day. I read about it once before and thought “damn this stuff sounds intense, too bad I’ll probably never find any” and to my surprise I found it. Just a few hits from my buddy’s chillum and I was just absolutely fried beyond fried and the smells are like an orgasm to your nose. Great strain, 10/10 would combust again”
“feels more like an in indica than a sativa, IMO.”

“I fell in love instantly, the smell of the flower alone was piny, yet fruity, which I love. Smoked it in a jay to really taste the flower, perfect combination of tasty and piny, it is a sativa-dominant hybrid, but had a perfect balance. I felt extremely happy and uplifted, but it also hit me harder than i anticipated, I didn’t mind though. My body felt as if it was floating but my mind refreshed. When I came down, I ...”
“very piney but has a good taste and an even better high”
“Great plant, smoked decently . Not a lot of coughing while smoking I recommend this plant when you want a mellow mood not too much energy not too much energy taken away”
“Tastes very good and smells wonderful, found it harder to light but when i got it going, i flew through sky i was so high an amazing buzz but the trouble i had lighting it annoyed me”
“phenomenal - great for migraines and a very uplifting feeling.”

“The look was great and the flavor was most definitely there. not as fruity as I hoped but very smooth and citrusy none the less. Great day time buzz while not being incapacitated with a move mellow come down!”

“Pretty intense, you really felt the Sativa effects almost immediately, and after an hour or so, I felt really sleepy and kind of disoriented. I smoke everyday and never have any paranoia, but this one did give me some. Not too bad, but still. I'll smoke it again, but maybe only when I'm in for the night and watching a movie or something. Not a good day time smoke.”
“Very intense high. Best for relaxing and watching episodes of a series but maybe not a movie.”
“nice love this strain no pain awesome.”

“A friend of mine grew this strain (In Oregon, legal to grow.) and the turn out was wonderful! 💖
Light, fluffy, very sticky (I did have trouble breaking apart because it was so sticky. 😉), and dense buds for the TEXTURE.
The COLOR a bright green, sparkly from trichromes, and brightly colored hairs.
The SMELL was delicious, unlike anything I have smelled before. (Can't put words to it. 😣)
I SMOKED this strain and th...”

“Pineapple Trainwreck is awesome it relived me from my pain instantly I mean instantly... I feel great 100% better ... I did the research on the strain found it in Denver and the rest is ALL smiles....WOW”

“I smoked this strain for the first time through a bong. Man, I haven't hit something this heavy in a while. It was VERY harsh on my lungs and hard to finish the first bowl, which was pretty packed. The high hits right away and hard at that, I was just out there for a little bit but once it settles in it's great for conversation although your mind does tend to wander. It lasts very long as well and the good thing is t...”
“Eh, I've had better. A little weak for my liking. It does however wake you up and make you feel ready for your day. Great aroma, before and after. Extremely sweet smell.”

“very good strain to get a great energetic high from. this one kicks in quick and gives u energy, creativity,  beyond happy n talkative while maintaing a good pain relief for my low bac muscle spasums.”
“Great taste and hits you like a freight train! In my top 5 for sure.”
“not bad, but gets me pretty dried out. gotta chew lotsa double bubble to make up for that stuff”
“The flavor was great, but really made me anxious. Just take a little extra precautions when trying this strain if you suffer from any type of anxiety.”
“Tastes great, earthy but crispy, almost citricy. Mellow high, lasted about an hr which is unusually long for me, so a must buy for me”

“blast off 🚀 great for day time use. careful if tend to have a lil anxiety when it comes to the sativa dominant strains though. this one will get ya goin. overall great flavor and smooth smoke. enjoy ✌”
“Very great smell. Both sweet and pungent. Loved it. Good chill high. Very dense”
“great med. liked the smell and taste. Helped my nausea”
“This strain made me hella dizzy 👌🏼 I slept like a baby though. If you wanna feel like you're floating- this is your strain.”
“really good strain hate the smell and taste but worth it for the high !”
“One of my favorites.  Hits hard, lasts 3-4 hours.  A great chill-out, do nothing but eat and relax.  Pain disappears.  Can be hard to find, but worth it.  :)”
“This was my first grow.  Great strain”
“my name is”
“very tasty long lasting high great wake and bake”

“Clean , uplifting, floating . Yum yum tasty .
Grows like a damn weed.”
“excellent mood can find at local shops like Oregon Bud Company.”
“I may have smoked more this time than last, hence the paranoia. ;) Anyway, Pineapple Trainwreck is very nice and one of the better of the top shelves i have had in a bit.”
“they should call this car wreck cause while i was smoking this shit i wrecked..... but felt pretty chill”

“I really love this strain. Although the dry mouth is absolutely horrible, the high itself is well worth it. The head high lasts at least an hour if you take a few good hits. Any pain will subside for a good 3+ hours! I have a hairline fracture in my ankle and I'm in no pain after smoking this! The crystals on the leaves are super noticeable and it smells and tastes sweet. Overall an amazing mix! I'll be smoking this ...”
“just about to purchase hope it is dense and hits hard and most of all I hope I get stoned as' f”

“Not as good as I was expecting smoked two bowls didn't really hit that hard....not even sure if I really got high going to try it in a blunt tomorrow hope it hits better ! really good smell though !!!!!”
